articles.title: Nintendo Turns to Samsung to Make Chips, Ramp Up Switch 2 Output - Bloomberg
articles.description: Nintendo Co. has turned to Samsung Electronics Co. to help make the main chips for the Switch 2, a move that may help the Japanese company ramp up production of the gaming console enough to sell a higher-than-projected 20 million units by March 2026.

articles.title: Wizkids Apologizes After Its Dodgy ‘Baldur’s Gate 3’ Miniatures Hit With Vicious Mockery - gizmodo.com
articles.description: 'We missed the mark,' a new statement says, after the new 'Dungeons & Dragons' miniatures were torn to shreds online last week.
